params.asset: The asset address for stale threshold lookup

returns._0: The price mantissa scaled to 18 decimals

params.feedAggregator: The address of the feed aggregator

returns._0: The address of the deployed FeedsAccess contract

params.pToken: The pToken to get the underlying price of

returns._0: The underlying asset price mantissa (scaled by 1e18).  Zero means the price is unavailable.

params.feedsAccessAddress: The FeedsAccess contract address (can be address(0) to unregister)

params._admin: The address to remove as admin

params._newAdmin: The address to add as admin

params.threshold: The default stale threshold in seconds

params.pToken: The pToken to set the price for

params.asset: The asset to update the cached price for

_getFeedsPrice(address,address).notice: Internal function to get price from feeds (separated for try/catch)

assetPrices(address).notice: Get asset price (v1 oracle interface compatibility)

deployFeedsAccess(address).notice: Deploy a new FeedsAccess contract for a given feed aggregator

getUnderlyingPrice(address).notice: Get the underlying price of a pToken asset

isPriceOracle().notice: Indicator that this is a PriceOracle contract (for inspection)

registerFeed(address,address).notice: Register a feeds access contract for an asset

setAssetStaleThreshold(address,uint256).notice: Set the stale threshold for a specific asset

setDefaultStaleThreshold(uint256).notice: Set the default stale threshold for all assets

setDirectPrice(address,uint256).notice: Set manual price directly for an asset

setUnderlyingPrice(address,uint256).notice: Set manual price for an asset (fallback mechanism)

updateCachedPrice(address).notice: Update the cached price for an asset from its feed
